item.title: Fix the tos page
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Unhandled:

I got into some strange infinite redirect loop with the “agreement.php?returnto=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php” page yesterday, not sure if it’s related to this but I had to clear my cookies and reaccept the TOS to view the site again.

I sometimes have the same issue. Restarting chrome usually helps, but it still sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix the tos page
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:15, topic:312632”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=409067.msg3021920#msg3021920 date=1257641048]

It wouldn’t be a difficult change, but I kind of want people to have to click the submit button.
[/quote]What’s the point?

They can’t suggest that they did it unintentionally. It’s far easier to accidentally bump the enter key.[/quote]And this matters how? Nobody reads the TOS anyway, no matter how much you want them to (until they get warned usually, then they look at it).

Read full topic

item.title: Fix the tos page
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It wouldn’t be a difficult change, but I kind of want people to have to click the submit button.

At least make it give the user little error message then, telling them that they have to actually click the button. When I first came here I was typing yes and hitting enter for about a minute, others may be even slower to learn.

Or is it secretly an intelligence gate?

Read full topic

item.title: Fix the tos page
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:13, topic:312632”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=409067.msg3019896#msg3019896 date=1257525322]
It wouldn’t be a difficult change, but I kind of want people to have to click the submit button.
[/quote]What’s the point?[/quote]
They can’t suggest that they did it unintentionally. It’s far easier to accidentally bump the enter key.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix the tos page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:8, topic:312632”][quote author=BAsh link=topic=409067.msg3019376#msg3019376 date=1257480319]

It does in firefox and konqueror. I do know it doesn’t do this in IE, but I don’t really care. Is it really that much of an issue?

You type ‘yes’ then you click once. And because it saves the cookie you have to do it once…

OF COURSE ITS AN ISSUE. I HAVE TO CLICK ON SOMETHING ONCE?!??!
[/quote]
every few months*[/quote]

I believe it is every month actually. (2592000 seconds)

Read full topic
